valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Tue 27 Jan 2026 to 00:00 (UTC) on Wed 28 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low FitzRoy 975 expected northwestern Ireland 961 by 1800 Tuesday

Viking.text:
Wind
In southwest, southeasterly 6 to gale 8. In northeast, southeasterly 3 to 5.
Sea state
In southwest, moderate or rough, becoming very rough. in northeast, slight or moderate, becoming moderate or rough.
Weather
In southwest, wintry showers. In northeast, fair.
Visibility
Good, occasionally poor in southwest.

Gale warning
Issued:
09:50 (UTC) on Mon 26 Jan 2026
Southeasterly gale force 8 expected later
